name: The Challenges of Decentralised Worlding
description: In this session, we will delve into the evolution of human networks from ancient times to the present, examining the factors that cause these networks to either decline or persist. Looking at how decentralized worldbuilding mirrors historical network construction, we will find instructive lessons in this history for building enduring networks that outlive their creators.

speakers.name: Loaf
speakers.bio: Loaf is a founding contributor to BiblioDAO, Loot Realms, and Dojo. They focus on developing onchain games and tools.
